title: Individual Vanilla Cakes with Raspberry Jam Topping

ingredients.content: 90 g unsalted butter, soft, plus extra for greasing

preparations.content: Grease 6 Thermomix ramekins size 1 then divide raspberry jam between them.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Place butter, caster sugar and vanilla sugar in mixing bowl then mix <b>40 sec/speed 3<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add eggs and whisk <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b> and scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add flour, milk and baking powder then mix <b>20 sec/speed 3<b>. Finish mixing by hand with spatula if necessary. Divide mixture between prepared ramekins. Cover each ramekin with heat-resistant cling film and place in Varoma dish. Clean mixing bowl.

Place water in mixing bowl, place covered Varoma into position and steam <b>30 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma, carefully remove Varoma lid and leave cakes to cool for approx. 10 minutes. Carefully remove cling film, unmould cakes with a table knife and serve warm.
